abstract: An unwitting breach of etiquette gained the writer a reputation for being conceited and self-important — which she’s heard from many people with no firsthand knowledge of the situation.
snippet: An unwitting breach of etiquette gained the writer a reputation for being conceited and self-important — which she’s heard from many people with no firsthand knowledge of the situation.
lead_paragraph: Every book on doing business in China touts the importance of building personal connections and “guanxi.”

headline.main: How I Made My Biggest Mistake in China (So Far)
